Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Maximum allowed team size based on cross-functionality

Name: Skill Match Requirement
Description: Employees assigned must have necessary skills

Name: Feature Must Be Reviewed
Description: Every feature must go through a sprint review

Name: Product Owner Availability
Description: Product Owner must be available to manage backlog

Name: Workload Balance
Description: Avoid overloading any single team or worker

Name: Backlog Contains Features
Description: Every backlog must contain at least one feature

Name: No Overlapping Tasks
Description: Tasks must not overlap in time for same worker

Name: Priority Alignment
Description: Tasks chosen should align with project or feature priority
